aerostyle.css:
<?php
*{
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    }
    
    .main{
        width: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(to top,rgba(0,0,0,0.5)1%,rgba(0,0,0,0.5)1%),url(1.jpg);
        background-position: center;
        background-size: cover;
        height: 109vh;
    }
    .navbar{
        width: 1200px;
        height: 75px;
        margin: auto;
    }
    .icon{
        width: 400px;
        float: left;
        height: 120px;
    }
    .logo{
        margin: 2%;
        color:orange;
        font-size: 50px;
        font-family: monospace;
        padding-top: 10px;
    }
    ul{
        float: left;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    ul li{
        list-style: none;
        margin-left: 62px;
        margin-top: 27px;
        font-size: 22px;
    
    }
    ul li a{
        text-decoration: none;
        color: white;
        font-family: Arial;
        font-weight: bold;
        transition: 0.5s ease-in-out;
    
    }
    ul li a:hover{
        color:rgb(82, 201, 58);
    
    }
    .search{
        width: 330px;
        float: left;
        margin-left: 470px;
    }
    .srch{
        font-family:cursive;
        width: 230px;
        height: 25px;
        /* background: transparent; */
        border: 1.5px solid rgb(46, 206, 46);
        margin-top: 13px;
        color:black;
        border-right: none;
        font-size: 14px;
        float: right;
        padding: 1px;
        border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
        border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    }
    .btn{
        width:100px;
        height: 20px;
        background: rgb(68, 236, 172);
        border: 2px;
        float:right;
        margin-top: 1px;
        font-size: 15px;
        border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
        border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
    }
    .srch:focus{
        outline: rgb(224, 203, 15);
    }
    .content{
        width: 800px;
        position: relative;
    }
    p.wel{
        padding-left: 20px;
        font-family: cursive;
        color:white;
        letter-spacing: 1.2px;
    }
    h2.let{
        color: aqua;
    }
    button.cn{
        width: 100px;
        height: 40px;
        background:red;
        border: rgb(23, 236, 112);
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-left: 440px;
        border-radius: 10px;
        cursor: pointer;
    }
    button.cn a{
        text-decoration: none;
        color: white;
        transition: 0.5s ease;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-family: monospace;
    }
    .cn:hover{
        background-color:black;
    }
    .form{
        margin-top: 220px;
        margin-left: 80px;
        width: 300px;
        height: 350px;
        background: linear-gradient(to top,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)80%,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)80%);
        border-radius: 10px;
    }
    .form h3{
        width: 240px;
        font-family: sans-serif;
        text-align: center;
        color: orange;
        background-color: white;
        border-radius: 10px;
        margin-top: auto;
        margin-left: 26px;
        padding: 6px;
    
    }
    .form input{
        width:240px;
        height: 35px;
        background: transparent;
        border-bottom: 1px solid orangered;
        border-top: none;
        border-left: none;
        border-right: none;
        color: aliceblue;
        font-size: 15px;
        letter-spacing: 1px;
        margin-top: 30px;
        margin-left: 32px;
        font-family: sans-serif;
    
    }
    button.btng{
        width:200px;
        height: 30px;
        background: rgb(5, 236, 24);
        border: 2px;
        float: right;
        margin-top: 35px;
        margin-right: 45px;
        font-size: 18px;
        border-radius: 10px;
    }
    button.btng a{
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 20px;
    }
    p.link{
        margin-top: 4px;
        margin-left: 55px;
        color: red;
    }
    .form a.su{
        margin-top: 15px;
        margin-left: 95px;
        color:green;
    }
    .form a.su:hover{
        color: white;
    
    }
    .btng:hover{
        background-color:white;
    }

?>
